title: Rubén Fontana
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809034453/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809034453/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Rubén Fontana**

Argentinean type designer.  
Teaches at the [FADU](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809034453/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FADU) in Buenos Aires.  
Editor of the [tipoGráfica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809034453/http:/typophile.com/wiki/tipoGrafica) magazine.  
His [Fontana](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809034453/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontana) type family was one of the winners of the 2003 [TDC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809034453/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TDC)2 contest.
author: paul d hunt
